channel.title: Free membership
channel.description: I was posting this so i could help people earn free memberships(10$ runescape game card) who are in need of one. I do not ask for anything in return or any benefits. How to do: Register on the website and complete surveys until you have gained 900 points. (This is fairly easy) The website link is: [url=http://www.google.com/]http://www.google.com[/url] (Replace google with prizerebel) There are also many other things you can earn on this website. I myself a member have done this several times for some of my multiple accounts. Just trying to help people gain free membership (Runescape 10$ game card) If this is the wrong section or prohibited then please feel free to delete the topic. Also not posting this as spam but to help other runescape players.

item.title: Free membership
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:9, topic:526808”][quote author=Stunninhigh link=topic=645555.msg4342273#msg4342273 date=1375312667]
Its nobody’s say so other than the mods/admins on this forum
[/quote]Since when? You don’t have to be a staff member to tell someone the rules or that something is against the rules.

[quote author=Stunninhigh link=topic=645555.msg4342273#msg4342273 date=1375312667]All you guys are mostly power hungry
[/quote]What?

[quote author=Stunninhigh link=topic=645555.msg4342273#msg4342273 date=1375312667]and yes it is in the rules, as you can see he changed it.
[/quote]I suggest you read the rules, since giveaways of any kind are not allowed unless approved by a moderator.[/quote]

Who said anything about a giveaway? LOL! You sir, are retarded.

Read full topic
